percent_off: ${a_item} costs $${price} at the ${store}. It's currently ${percent}% off for the sale. What is the sale price?
The regular price of ${a_item} is $${price}. With a ${percent}% discount, what does it cost now?
At ${store}, ${a_item} that normally costs $${price} is on sale for ${percent}% off. What's the new price?
During the sale at ${store}, ${a_item} priced at $${price} is ${percent}% off. How much does it cost?
percent_increase: A stock worth $${base} increases by ${percent}%. What is its new value?
An investment of $${base} grows by ${percent}%. What is it worth now?
If something valued at $${base} increases by ${percent}%, what is the new value?
After a ${percent}% increase, what is the value of something that was worth $${base}?
tip_calculation: Your bill at the ${restaurant} is $${bill}. You want to leave a ${percent}% tip. How much is the tip?
After a meal costing $${bill}, you decide to tip ${percent}%. How much tip do you leave?
The total bill at ${restaurant} comes to $${bill}. If you tip ${percent}%, how much is the tip?
At ${restaurant}, your bill is $${bill}. You leave a ${percent}% tip. What is the tip amount?
simple_percent: If you take ${percent}% of ${whole}, what do you get?
